description:
The Kyuuso Clan is a clan composed of rat youkai, many of which disguise themselves as humans to lure in unsuspecting prey. They have a rivalry with the http://anidb.net/ch37615 [Bakeneko Clan]. They were once a part of the http://anidb.net/ch37514 [Nura Clan] but were excommunicated by http://anidb.net/ch17493 [Nurarihyon].
Source: Nurarihyon no Mago Wiki
name: Kyuuso-gumi
